content: Structure-based Molecular Design Team | 理化学研究所 ライフサイエンス技術基盤研究センター Large Small language About CLST > CLST Logo > Pamphlet > STAFF > CLST Advisory Council Report > Organization > History of RIKEN CLST Jobs at CLST Access Contact us Links Labs Labs & Program Center Director's Strategic Program RIKEN CLST-JEOL Collaboration Center RIKEN CLST-DAIKIN Collaboration Center Publications FANTOM Technologies & Facilities Technologies of CLST Service of CLST NMR facility GeNAS PET Academy Radiosynthesis Database of PET Probes Topics Research Latest publications from CLST. News Awards, agreements, and other news. Events Upcoming and past events including seminars, symposiums, open days. For Public To let you know about our research, this area contains 4 types of information about CLST; “Article”, “Videos”, “Event” and “Study”. At “Article”, you can read articles on interviews and lectures, and you can enjoy the videos about CLST at “Videos”. If you want to meet and talk directly with the researcher, “Visit” give you some information of such events. You can find more difficult contents to know about our research deeply at “Study”. Team LeaderTeruki Honma  Ph.D. 1-7-22 Suehiro-cho, Tsurumi-ku, Yokohama, 230-0045 JAPAN Tel: 045-503-9433 Research AreaWe plan to develop methods for designing novel small molecules, nucleic acids, and proteins, in order to help to accelerate drug development and the elucidation of living systems, and also develop an FBDD (Fragment based Drug Discovery) method for targeting biomolecules currently difficult to make susceptible of binding to small molecules.
